be.ac.umons.jsonschematools

Class AbstractConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.ac.umons.jsonschematools.AbstractConstants

  • public class AbstractConstants
extends Object
    Constants used for our abstractions for strings, integers, numbers, and enum values. Strings are always equal to "\S", ignoring the requirements of the schema. In a similar way, integers are always "\I", numbers "\D", and enum values "\E".
    Author:
    GaÃ«tan Staquet

    • Method Detail

      • abstractConstValue

        public static Object abstractConstValue(Object object)
        Abstract a const value given in an object. That is, it recursively replaces the strings by "\S", the integers by "\I", and so on. See AbstractConstants for the abstracted values.
        Parameters:
        object - The object to abstract
        Returns:
        An abstracted version of the object, or null if the object can not be abstracted.
